Description
Feel like Balrog from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of trunks! Wanna be the champ? You'll need these trunks! Now go get paid! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Balrog de Street Fighter IV avec ce short alternatif ! Tu veux être champion ? Commence par mettre ton short ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit dieser alternativen Sporthose wie Balrog aus Street Fighter IV! Willst du ein Champion sein? Dann brauchst du diese Sporthose! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Diventa Balrog di Street Fighter IV con questo paio alternativo di calzoncini! Vuoi diventare il campione? Hai bisogno di questi calzoncini! Ora vai a guadagnarti la pagnotta! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte estos pantalones cortos alternativos y siéntete como Balrog de Street Fighter IV! ¡Si quieres ser el campeón vas a necesitarlos! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 バイソンになりきることができるズボンのアレンジ ver.！ プロボクサーを目指すならこのズボン！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 발로그가 되는 바지 어렌지 ver.！ 프로 복서를 목표로 하고 있다면 이 바지! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Balrog from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of trunks! Wanna be the champ? You'll need these trunks! Now go get paid! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
